Class FileFuntions

public class FileFuntions
extends java.lang.Object
Functions for working with files

Yolanda

      public static void saveImageNoBeforeProcess​(java.io.File file, java.lang.String originalDir, java.lang.String originalName)

      Parameters:
      file - file to save
      originalDir - the main directory
      originalName - the id of the image in the excel file

    • saveSelectedImage

      public static boolean saveSelectedImage​(java.io.File selectedFile, java.lang.String saveDirPath)
      Save the files from the temporal folder to the prediction folder exchanging the original files in the prediction folder with the temporal ones. Save the tiff and roi/zip and change the corresponding row on the result excel
      Parameters:
      selectedFile - The temporal file to save
      saveDirPath - path of the save directory
      Returns:
      true if the file is save false otherwise

      Parameters:

      saveDirPath - path to save the file

    • isDirectoryContentModify

      public static void isDirectoryContentModify​(java.lang.String directory, TabPanel tp)
      check if the directory has change. If true, we change the content of the tabpanel adding or deleting images
      Parameters:
      directory - the path of the directory
      tp - The tabPanel that shows the content of the directory

    • checkStillExist

      public static void checkStillExist​(ShowImages images, java.util.List<java.lang.String> actualImages, TabPanel tp)
      Check if the images shown still exist, the had been modify and change the images that the showImages is showing. Close the ViewImagesBigger.
      Parameters:
      images - ShowImages with the images shown
      actualImages - List of the images of the directory
      tp - The current tabPanel

    • imagescheckWithTime

      public static java.util.Timer imagescheckWithTime​(TabPanel tp, int secons)
      We check if the images on the directory has been modified, deleted or new ones has been added in the seconds given
      Parameters:
      tp - The tabpanel that contains the tab with the images
      secons - the seconds between calls
      Returns:
      Timer

    • checkTiffNotPredictionsFolder

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> checkTiffNotPredictionsFolder​(java.io.File folder, java.lang.String nameFileNoExt)
      Function that checks if there is tiff and roi files in the folder but not in the predictions folder In case of finding Tiff and roi files in the folder it ask you if you want to move the files to a prediction folder
      Parameters:
      folder - the folder to check if have tiff and roi files
      nameFileNoExt - name of the file without extension want to find it's tiff in the predictions folder, if "" all the files
      Returns:
      List of strings with the paths of tiff files in the folder given

    • moveTifffromParentToPredictions

      public static void moveTifffromParentToPredictions​(java.io.File folder, java.util.List<java.lang.String> listImages, java.io.File predictionsDir)
      Moves the tiff and roi files from the folder to the predictionsDir
      Parameters:
      folder - the folder to check if have tiff and roi files
      listImages - the list of tiff files
      predictionsDir - the folder predictions

      Type Parameters:
      K - Type of the key
      V - Type of the value
      Parameters:
      map - Map to search the key
      value - the value we wants to know the key

      tempoFolder - new folder

    • changeToriginalNameAndFolder

      public static void changeToriginalNameAndFolder​(java.lang.String dirPredictions, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​javax.swing.JButton> originalNewSelected)
      Moves the files to the predictions folder, changes the name of the selected files (Jbutton) to the original ones checks if there is already a file with that name in that case delete it and move the other from the temporal folder.
      Parameters:
      dirPredictions - path of the images predicted
      originalNewSelected - map of string-JButton that contains the name of the image- button selected with the image selected to save

    • isOriginalImage

      public static boolean isOriginalImage​(java.io.File folder)
      Searchs if in a folder there is original files (nd2,tif or jpg)
      Parameters:
      folder - folder to search original files
      Returns:
      true if there is original images (nd2 or tif) in the folder

      public static void createUpdater​(java.lang.Boolean callFromMain)
      If a new version of the jar is find and the user wants to update, calls the updateJar and kills the execution of this jar
      Parameters:
      callFromMain - true if the method is call in the main method false if it is call in the JMEnu

      public static void saveAlgorithmConfi​(java.lang.String selectedItemFluo, java.lang.String selectedItemTif, java.lang.String selectedItemNd2, java.lang.String selectedItemJPG)
      Save the current algorithm to each type of image
      Parameters:
      selectedItemFluo - name of the algorithm of the fluo images
      selectedItemTif - name of the algorithm of the Tif images
      selectedItemNd2 - name of the algorithm of the ND2 images
      selectedItemJPG - name of the algorithm of the JPG images

    • changedCombox

      public static boolean changedCombox​(java.lang.String selectedItemFluo, java.lang.String selectedItemTif, java.lang.String selectedItemNd2, java.lang.String selectedItemJPG)
      Checks if the selected item of the combobox
      Parameters:
      selectedItemFluo - name of the algorithm saved for the fluo images
      selectedItemTif - name of the algorithm saved for the Tif images
      selectedItemNd2 - name of the algorithm saved for the ND2 images
      selectedItemJPG - name of the algorithm saved for the JPG images
      Returns:
      true if any of the items of the combobox has changed

    • checkSavedAlgoPropertiesFile

      public static boolean checkSavedAlgoPropertiesFile​(java.lang.String fluoSave, java.lang.String tifSave, java.lang.String nd2Save, java.lang.String jpgSave)
      Checks if the algorithms for each type of image are save in the properties file. If not save it.
      Parameters:
      fluoSave - name of the algorithm for the fluo images
      tifSave - name of the algorithm for the tif images
      nd2Save - name of the algorithm for the nd2 images
      jpgSave - name of the algorithm for the jpg images
      Returns:
      true the algorithms has been changed
